title: Thunderbird runs only by typing it into Win-R.  Cannot find the exe file on my new Win 11 laptop
content:
Just installed Mozilla Thunderbird on my new Dell Win 11 laptop. I can only run it by typing it in the Win-R line. I cannot find any folders or executables on the laptop. Appreciate any help you can give me. Want to get this settled before I try to move my Win 10 Thunderbird Profile file over.

Thanks
creator: neraklrae

title: Thunderbird email account setup for Gmail will not accept my password for the account
content: I installed Thunderbird and set up my Outlook account with no problem. However, every time I try to add my Gmail account I get an error message "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username, or password." This happens whether I try to set up the account using either Thunderbird's automatic configuration by doing a manual configuration. Can anyone help? I can log into Gmail on the web with this email address and password with no problem.

title: Thunderbird email memory utilization
content: When I start Thunderbird email client, what is loaded into data memory? Is all of my email loaded into memory? Is the inbox for my login loaded into memory? I try to keep my inbox under 1000 emails. In all of the subfolders under the inbox I have a very large number of emails archived.

title: Schedule send for emails
content: As we need to send many for marketing in a day, but if we use Thunderbird, the emails will all be sent in a short time, which will cause our email address to be blocked by some users, so I wonder if we can schedule a time to send the messages. For example, messages can be sent at 3-minute interval. Does thunderbird have such a tool?
creator: elmercherryzhou

title: Account information disappeared, cannot be saved
content:
All the information that normally appears when one clicks on the name of an account in account settings (account name, your name, e-mail address, outgoing server to use, signature, et cet.) has disappeared on all three of my accounts. When I re-enter the information, Thunderbird does not save it.

It happens in troubleshooting mode too.

Thunderbird does still know the account names, my name, my e-mail addresses, and my signatures even though that information does not appear on the page.

How can I make Thunderbird show this information again and make sure that it's using the right outgoing servers?

Scooter
creator: mozilla98

title: Authentication for Thunderbird to access Gmail
content:
I have read this post [https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/que.../1484529] and I am having the same problem. It appears the OP has now gone away as there are no more updates. It appears they have either given up or found a solution and not posted it.

Question: On every start of Thunderbird, I get the popup from Google requesting access for TB to my gmail account that I am using here. I answer yes to allow TB and then this is followed up by an email from Google to my gmail acount and my backup email. Is this correct the correct operation? I personally don't think so as I thought everything should be transparent after setting things up. I don't seem have this probem with my other two gmail accounts either. I have tried repeatedly to find out how to fix this but I have not been successful. I have found numerous articles about this in various forums but they have either been extremely vague or not posted the solution. I am almost sure something changed a while ago but I don't know what it was.

I would be very grateful if someone could tell me how to fix this.
creator: davejohns61

Mohu část souborů Thunderbird ukládat na ten další disk a jak to mám nastavit? Možná by pomohlo ukládat na ten další disk jen archívy, jak to mám nastavit? Dík!

title: QR codes does not synchronize with the desktop app
content:
On my desktop app I have several email accounts five. I installed the Thunderbird for mobile application and I'm trying to synchronize using QR code. I select multiple accounts. When the QR code is displayed on the desktop, The Thunderbird application does not recognize it.

I also tried one account per time. It only recognized one account.

Is there a known bug, something that needs to be fixed, or something wrong on my end.

title: Connectiviteit met windows 11 home
content:
Hallo,

Na ik van windows 10 naar Windows 11 geupgrade heb op deze laptop, kan ik geen mails meer ontvangen of versturen. Soms zelden komt er toch iets door maar dat is één enkele uitzondering.

Heb zelf al Norton en NordVPN op mijn pc uitgeschakeld maar dat hielp ook niet. (Dus windows defender staat ook af).

Ook al thunderbird terug geinstaleerd, maar zonder pos resultaat.

Kan U me helpen ?

Groeten, Kris

title: exporting address books
content: I have used Thunderbird for years. This week I bought a new laptop and downloaded Thunderbird on it, but realized that my address books aren't there. So I opened my old computer to try to transfer them but could not figure out how to export the address books to the new computer. I found a link re exporting address books for Thunderbird on lifewire.com, but the instruction steps do not correspond to my "old" Thunderbird interface. Fiddling around with that has not revealed steps that will make it work. This could be serious. Any ideas?
creator: djmehegan1

title: Thunderbird Nebula on Raspberry Pi OS (bookworm)
content:
New system, new install of Thunderbird. I get the following error :

[GFX1-]: RenderCompositorSWGL failed mapping default framebuffer, no dt [GFX1-]: glxtest: DRM render node not clearly detectable. Falling back to using the only one that was found.

Thunderbird seems to work okay, but this is annoying.
creator: theoldwizard1

title: Renamed folder and all emails in that folder are gone
content:
Hi. I renamed a folder and stupidly used a special character (I think that's what caused the problem). The folder is now empty. Seeing an old reply on the forum, I looked in the file list and see that the data seems to still be there but I don't know how to get it back. I've added an image of the directory. It was called .HOLD and I changed it to .Check Here -> HOLD. I changed it back to .HOLD to see if that would help but it didn't. I closed and restarted Thunderbird and that didn't help either.

Thank you for any help.
